name: Angela
description: Inherits **12%** of the Wanderer's flame, ice, volt and physical ATK. Angela has **1** module spot and **5** skill points.
advancements: Increase attack inheritance to **18%**, increase Angela's Flying Kick damage to **1602%** of ATK, Angela now has **2** module spots and **8** skill points.
Increase attack inheritance to **24%**, increase Frost Explosion damage to **1481%** of ATK, Angela now has **3** module spots and **11** skill points.
Increase attack inheritance to **30%**, increase Angela Loves You damage to **1668%** of ATK, Angela now has **4** module spots and **15** skill points.

abilities.name: Frost Explosion
abilities.effect: Angela aims at an enemy. An ice burst deals damage equal to **987%** of ATK  damage to hit enemies, and cause the target to freeze for **6** seconds.

abilities.name: Angela Loves You
abilities.effect: Angela raised her hands high, accumulating strength on top of her head. Then she shoots the power at the enemy in front, dealing damage equal to **1112%** of ATK, and applying the **frostbyte** state on the target.

abilities.name: Angela's Flying Kick
abilities.effect: Angela flies up for a distance, then dives down and kicks the enemy, dealing damage equal to **1068%** of ATK to the target.
